attributes.action: Audit finances of sadiq Khan's mayorship of London
attributes.additional_details: Complete audit of funding and finances and management of mayor sadiq Khan's mayorship as needing bailouts are a concern for waste of public money
attributes.background: Check the funding and management of mayor sadiq Khan as needing many bailouts is a serious concern for public financing, to ensure that the mayor has not mismanaged resources

rejection.details:
Scrutiny of the Mayor of London is a matter for the London Assembly, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

If you are concerned about the Mayor's job performance you could petition the London Assembly. You can find out how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
